schema_description: Products attributes. Source: RINT API v4.

fields.description: Client name.
fields.name: __client_name

fields.description: Source name.
fields.name: __source_name

fields.description: Schema version.
fields.name: __schema_version

fields.description: Event timestamp.
fields.name: __event_timestamp

fields.description: Barcodes is a upc list reduced only to those UPC that correspond to retail_level units plus normalized to such a form as in output of barcode reading.
fields.name: barcodes

fields.description: Number of product units in the product case.
fields.name: boxcase

fields.description: Product case unit height.
fields.name: height

fields.description: Product case unit length.
fields.name: length

fields.description: Unit in which cases's size is measured.
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Product case unit width.
fields.name: width

fields.description: Unit in which product case's size is weighted.
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Product case unit gross weight.
fields.name: weight

fields.description: Corp_id is the ID used by retailer for their supply chain management operations.
fields.name: corp_ids

fields.description: Ecom_id is used by retailer to identify a product entity selectable by customers in shopping applications.
fields.name: ecom_ids

fields.description: Field to store additional or service information about product in location.
fields.name: extra

fields.description: Bulk items are not pushed into OSR.
fields.name: is_bulk

fields.description: Chemical designation should be used to designate anything that should not be stored in a tote with a food item because of risk of odor or flavor contamination.
fields.name: is_chemical

fields.description: Everything that will lose the form and structure when placed under heavy products.
fields.name: is_crushable

fields.description: Everything that will crush other products and can’t be stacked.
fields.name: is_heavy

fields.description: Raw is used for items that should be stored at the lowest level of the OSR chilled section.
fields.name: is_raw

fields.description: Mid-temperature chilled area (~45-50F instead of 35F)
fields.name: is_specific_chilled

fields.description: Hazardous are items that can become an operations or safety risk if stored in the OSR
fields.name: is_hazardous

fields.description: Fragile items
fields.name: is_glass_packaged

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item requires strictly vertical storage
fields.name: is_vertical

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item can be placed on top of another item
fields.name: is_stackable

fields.description: TRUE denotes that the item has to be stored by cases only
fields.name: is_case_storage

fields.description: Some items require additional bagging at the picking station
fields.name: is_requires_plastic_bag

fields.description: Primary key used to identify TOM product_item.
fields.name: id

fields.description: Chemical designation should be used to designate anything that should not be stored in a tote with a food item because of risk of odor or flavor contamination.
fields.name: is_chemical

fields.description: Everything that will lose the form and structure when placed under heavy products.
fields.name: is_crushable

fields.description: Raw is used for items that should be stored at the lowest level of the OSR chilled section.
fields.name: is_raw

fields.description: Flag indicates if the product is weight-variable.
fields.name: is_scalable

fields.description: Timestamp when product attributes was updated.
fields.name: last_modified_ts

fields.description: The average weight of 1 unit for scalable items.
fields.name: average_weight_measure

fields.description: Average weight unit of measure. Can be only 'lb' or 'ea'.
fields.name: average_weight_unit

fields.description: Shows if item is sold only in e-store.
fields.name: ecom_only_item

fields.description: Identify if the product price will be calculated by the actual weight of picked items.
fields.name: is_weight_variable

fields.description: Specified aisle in the shop floor, not MFC.
fields.name: aisle

fields.description: Specified bay in the shop floor, not MFC.
fields.name: bay

fields.description: Specified shelf in the shop floor, not MFC.
fields.name: shelf

fields.description: FLO or REG. FLO for all batch items (picked from shop floor), REG otherwise. All other values (including blank) will be treated as invalid.
fields.name: item_type

fields.description: Identify if the product can be purchased for MFC:ntrue - do not include the item into purchase order, false - item can be included into purchase order.
fields.name: mfc_stop_buy

fields.description: Identify that the product can't be picked for customer order even if it has positive stock:true - do not pick the product, false - the product can be picked.
fields.name: mfc_stop_fulfill

fields.description: Corp-id is the ID used by retailer for their supply chain management operations. refer to corp-ids attribute. We have many-to-many relationship between Corp-id and UPCs In this  attribute retailer provide us primary corp-id, it can be different for different locations.
fields.name: primary_corp_id

fields.description: Retailer-specific store-id represents MFC as a store location, this attribute is important in resolving location-specific parameters.
fields.name: store_id

fields.description: Identify for what amount of product purchase-price specified.
fields.name: purchase_price_amount

fields.description: Purchase price for the specified amount.
fields.name: purchase_price_cents

fields.description: Specify unit of measure for purchase-price-amount.
fields.name: purchase_price_unit

fields.description: Retailer-specific supplier id.
fields.name: supplier_id

fields.description: Identify if the product can be purchased from the supplier:true - do not include the item into the purchase order for this supplier, false - item can be included into the purchase order for this supplier.
fields.name: supplier_keep_buy

fields.description: Retailer-specific supplier name.
fields.name: supplier_name

fields.description: Supplier-specific product id.
fields.name: supplier_product_id

fields.description: Retailer-specific sub-account code, 3 digits number.
fields.name: supplier_sub_account

fields.description:
Can be  one of  {"orderable-dsd" , "dsd" , "dc"} 

Strictly one of the three:

"Orderable DSD" – Orderable DSD, delivered from DC warehouses  of retailer

"DSD" – true DSD vendor (non-orderable dsd)

"DC" – DC vendor, non DSD-items, centralized delivery

TO would need to print expected demand for each individual true DSD (non-orderable DSD) vendor, e.g. separate sheet of paper with vendor name on top, to assist re-order. true DSD vendors will not be able to see a shelf with their merchandize (that's something new for them).
fields.name: supplier_type

fields.description: Link to product's image.
fields.name: main_image

fields.description: Product description.
fields.name: name

fields.description: If requires-expiration-date = true, then decanting operator would be required to enter expiration date (which can be found on item packaging) at product intake.
fields.name: require_expiration_date

fields.description: Retailer category name.
fields.name: name

fields.description: Retailer category id.
fields.name: retailer_id

fields.description: Record update counter. Through all the lines nextval('products_revision_seq').
fields.name: revision

fields.description: The recommended maximum time for which products or fresh (harvested) produce can be stored, during which the defined quality of a specified proportion of the goods remains acceptable under expected (or specified) conditions of distribution, storage and display.
fields.name: shelf_life

fields.description: Parameters for slotting.
fields.name: slot_params

fields.description: Source document for product attributes.
fields.name: source

fields.description:
Temperature zone where products can be stored.

Dual temperature items can only be Ambient/Chilled. It is not possible to have Chilled/Frozen items since the OSR doesn't have a frozen section. If Temperature Zone = empty cell, then it will be listed as ambient/chilled.
fields.name: temperature_zone

fields.description: Product unit height.
fields.name: height

fields.description: Product unit length.
fields.name: length

fields.description: Unit in which product's size is measured.
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Product unit width.
fields.name: width

fields.description: Unit in which product item is weighted.
fields.name: unit_of_measure

fields.description: Product unit gross weight.
fields.name: weight

fields.description:
This is a list of all UPCs comprising the id (PK chosen for the purpose of described here product object entity). UPCs may include different packages (case GTIN) or various connected UPCs (identical for the purpose of picking).

Some retailers might have addition data  (linked UPCs).
fields.name: upcs
